code: import React from"react";import Particles from"react-particles-js";import{background}from"../../profile";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ParticlesBackground=function ParticlesBackground(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"particle",children:[background.type==="Snow"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Particles,{height:"100vh",width:"100%",params:{particles:{number:{value:75,density:{enable:false}},color:{value:"#000000"},size:{value:10,random:true},move:{direction:"bottom",out_mode:"out"},line_linked:{enable:false}},interactivity:{events:{onclick:{enable:true,mode:"remove"}},modes:{remove:{particles_nb:5}}}}}),background.type==="Particle"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Particles,{height:"100vh",width:"100vw",params:{particles:{collisions:{enable:true},number:{value:100,density:{enable:false}},color:"#000",size:{value:5,random:true,anim:{speed:4,size_min:0.3}},line_linked:{enable:true,color:"#000"},move:{random:true,speed:1,direction:"bottom",out_mode:"out"}},interactivity:{events:{onhover:{enable:true,mode:"bubble"},onclick:{enable:true,mode:"push"}},modes:{bubble:{distance:250,duration:2,size:6,opacity:0.4},push:{particles_nb:5}},retina_detect:true}}})]});};export default ParticlesBackground;
